entry.string: This email will be sent to users when they re-validate their account (IE, change email address)
entry.translation: Thees imeeel veell be-a sent tu users vhee zeey re-a-feleedete-a zeeur eccuoont (IE, chunge-a imeeel eddress)

entry.string: This email will be sent to users when an administrator change their password
entry.translation: Thees imeeel veell be-a sent tu users vhee un edmeenistretur chunge-a zeeur pessvurd

entry.string: The changes have been made to the selected user(s), you can now send a notification by submitting the form or go back to the
entry.translation: Zee chunges hefe-a beee mede-a tu zee selected user(s), yuoo cun noo send a nuteefficeshun by soobmeetting zee furm oor gu beck tu zee
